additional_commands.label: setname
additional_commands.about: To replace default 'visitor' name with your name

options.label: about
options.value: Hey there! I'm Kledi, a high school student with a passion for both gaming and programming. When I'm not hitting the books, you can usually find me immersed in the latest video game or exploring new programming concepts. I love the challenge of solving problems and building things from scratch. Whether it's creating a new website or leveling up my skills in my favorite game, I'm always eager to learn and grow.

options.label: skills
options.value: I'm familiar with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and Vite. Let's build something cool together!

data.label: Self-taught in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and Vite through personal projects and online resources.
data.value: Developed various web applications and websites; acquired proficiency in frontend technologies by actively engaging with tutorials, documentation, and hands-on practice.

data.label: Actively participated in coding challenges and online programming communities to further develop my abilities.
data.value: Regularly competed in coding competitions such as Codeforces and LeetCode, collaborated with peers on GitHub projects, and sought feedback from online communities like Stack Overflow.

data.label: Constantly seeking new opportunities to learn and grow in the field of web development.
data.value: Enthusiastically exploring new frameworks, libraries, and design patterns; continuously expanding knowledge through online courses, workshops, and industry articles.

options.label: projects
options.value: I've had the pleasure of working on diverse projects that showcase my skills and creativity.

data.label: Blog Website
data.value: This is a simple blog website where I share my thoughts and experiences.

data.label: Movies Website
data.value: This web application allows you to explore a collection of movies.

data.label: Age Calculator
data.value: This simple web application allows you to calculate your age based on your birthdate.

data.label: Crack the Code Game
data.value: A player has to guess the 3 numbers in order to win this game by using 5 simple hints. This is going to be a very interesting game. This game is built using simple mathematics in JavaScript.

data.label: Portfolio
data.value: My portfolio website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

options.label: contact
